phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Neon Genesis Evangelion
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Mune no door wo tataitemo
Tear open the door to your heart...
Watashidake wo tada mitsumete
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Hohoenderu anata
Standing there smiling serenely.
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Unmei sae mada shiranai
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
Dakedo itsuka kizuku deshou
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Haruka mirai mezasu tameno
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Zankoku na tenshi no thesis
The cruel angel's thesis bleeds...
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
Kono sora wo daite kagayaku.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare.
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Is he going to skip school again?
Shinji, wake up!
How long are you going to keep skipping school?
It is been five days now.
Unit 01 has already been completely repaired.
You are the pilot.
Are you going to just leave it like that?!
Shinji?!
He is run away.
That is not too surprising.
Shinji?
Well...
We are Shinji's classmates, Aida and Suzuhara, Madam.
Aida and Suzuhara?
Yes, Madam!
I am Suzuhara.
I am Suzuhara.
Are not you the boys who got in Unit 01's entry plug?
Yes, Madam!
We are sorry for causing so much trouble.
We are sorry for causing so much trouble.
The reason we came here today is that Ikari's been absent ever since then.
So, we came to see if he was okay.
Shinji?
He is at the NERV training facility right now.
Oh, I see.
These are the printouts that were building up on Shinji's desk.
Oh, sorry for your trouble.
Thank you.
Well, we will be leaving now.
Please say hi to Shinji for us.
Yeah, I will.
Bye.
This is an unexpected development.
She was a real babe, was not she?
Shinji, you idiot!
Jerk!
The next station is Naga'o Toge, Naga'o Toge.
The exit will switch to the right side.
Thank you for using the Tokyo 3 Loop Line.
This train will be going out of service at this station.
Please, make sure you take all of your belongings as you exit the train.
I have got to go back.
Hey there!
We are offering you a great bargain!
Hot young babes serving heavenly refreshment!
Special services to heal your tired body, services to fill you with energy!
You really could not detect it, Doctor?!
Yes.
An object only ten millimeters in diameter
crashed into Antarctica at close to the speed of light.
The technology we had was unable to predict or prevent such a thing.
It is like hell out there!
Just what is the purpose of science?!
The atmospheric flux caused by the change in the Earth's axis
has decreased by 3.
So, it is getting a little better?
No, there is still a tidal wave approaching at 230 meters a second!
Doctor!
We must evacuate!
It is my duty to remain here.
Doctor, choosing death is easy,
but you have an obligation to watch this living hell!
Idiot.
He is only fourteen years old.
It seems so cruel, making him bear the burden of mankind's destiny.
We have no choice.
We have to use fourteen year olds to pilot the Evas.
I know.
So, has he called or made contact?
So, has he called or made contact?
Nothing?
Nothing.
I do not think he is going to come back again.
What are you going to do?
Nothing really.
If he is not going to come back, that is okay too.
Why?
Because of what happened after that last battle.
Why did you ignore my order?
I am sorry.
I am the one who is in charge of your operations, right?
Yes.
You are supposed to obey my orders, you know!
Do you understand?
You are supposed to obey my orders, you know!
Do you understand?
Yes.
I am warning you, never do it again.
I am warning you, never do it again.
Yes.
Do you really understand what I am saying?!
Do you really understand what I am saying?!
Yes.
You are not going to get out of this by just saying yes to everything I say.
You are not going to get out of this by just saying yes to everything I say.
I know that.
That is enough, is not it?
We won the battle anyway.
Listen, it may seem easy to go along with whatever anyone else wants,
but if you get into the Eva with that attitude, it will kill you!
I do not care.
It would be nice if I could say you have got the right attitude,
but if you expect to get any praise out of me, you are wrong, Shinji Ikari.
That is not the point.
In any case, I am the only one who can pilot it, are not I?
I will do it.
I see.
If piloting an Eva means nothing but pain to him,
he should not get into it again.
Otherwise, I am sure he will be killed.
Otherwise, I am sure he will be killed.
But we need pilots.
Captain!
Aida, go on ahead!
But I cannot go and leave you behind!
You fool!
You fool!
No!
There!
The new kid?
Ikari!
Toji was sorry about that.
He said that his kid sister scolded him
and said that, it was the robot who saved our lives!
That is pretty embarrassing, being chewed out by a second grader.
Right?
I like it at night because those noisy cicadas do not chirp.
Although I remember that it was pretty quiet when I was a kid,
there've been more of them each year.
The ecosystem is returning to its former state.
That is what Misato said.
I see, Misato said so.
I really envy you.
Living with such a beautiful woman and piloting the Evangelion.
Oh God, I wish I could get behind the controls just once!
You should not.
I think your mother would be worried.
Oh, do not worry about that.
I do not have one.
I am the same as you.
You will have something to eat, will not you?
Yeah.
Do you usually do this sort of thing?
Well, sure.
Is this some kind of training for guerilla warfare or something?
How could I fight with toys like those?
It is just for fun.
You are Shinji Ikari, are not you?
Yes.
We are from NERV Security Intelligence.
We are from NERV Security Intelligence.
Under Article 8 of the Security Act, we are taking you to NERV HQ.
All right?
All right?
Yes.
And all you did was stand there?
That is easy for you to say!
But it is like I said, they were NERV Security Intelligence, professionals.
So what?!
Do not you have any balls at all?!
Sissy!
Sissy!
Pervert!
Only an idiot fights when he knows he cannot win.
Only an idiot fights when he knows he cannot win.
Balls have nothing to do with it.
Long time, no see.
Yes.
Do you feel any better after wandering around for two days?
Do you feel any better after wandering around for two days?
I do not know.
The Eva is on standby.
Will you pilot it?
Or will not you?
You are not going to scold me for running away?
Of course not.
I am not related to you, am I?
If I say that I will not pilot Unit 01, what will you do with it?
I suppose that Rei will do it.
Will not you pilot it?
It seems unrealistic for you to force everything on her.
Do not worry.
I will pilot it.
But you do not want to do it?
Of course not.
To begin with, it is not something that comes to me naturally.
But Ayanami, Miss Misato and Miss Ritsuko...
Cut that out!
This has nothing to do with any of us!
If you do not like it, get out of here!
Just forget all about Eva and us and go back to where you came from!
We do not need someone with that attitude piloting.
The Third Child is leaving Tokyo 3 tomorrow.
Then, we will reconfigure Unit 01's system for Rei.
But...
Regardless of the results of Unit 00's re-activation experiments,
Regardless of the results of Unit 00's re-activation experiments,
we will move on to experimenting with Unit 01.
According to the Marduk Organization's report,
the Fourth Child has not been found yet.
That means we cannot get any pilot recruits?
Excuse me, where is Miss Misato?
I would like to say good-bye.
You are no longer NERV personnel.
Therefore, we cannot give you any information.
Ikari!
You left this stuff behind!
You left this stuff behind!
Could you excuse me for a moment?
Thank you.
Hey, Toji.
Come on, say something!
Ikari, I am sorry I hit you twice.
Please, hit me back!
I cannot do that.
Please!
Otherwise, I will not be satisfied.
See?
He is a pretty embarrassing guy, is not he?
But if it will put an end to this dispute, why do not you go ahead and hit him?
But...
Hurry up!
You do not have much time, do you?
Hurry up!
You do not have much time, do you?
Okay, but only once.
Okay!
Come on!
Hold it!
Stop.
Do not hold back.
Right.
Ouch...
How did you know I would come here?
It was just a hunch.
We have seen dozens of classmates off before.
If you are leaving, we will have to leave this city sometime soon,
but we cannot blame you for that.
We saw how you suffered in the Eva.
And if anyone tries to blame you,
I am going to give them a head butt!
Hey, do not look so gloomy.
Take care.
Take care.
Good luck!
Good luck!
Well...
Your time is up.
I am the one who deserves to be hit!
I am mean, cowardly, dishonest, weak,
sneaky and a sissy.
Do not give us any more trouble.
He is gone.
Do you really think this is for the best?
The Hedgehog's Dilemma.
The closer we become, the more deeply we hurt each other.
Now I understand.
That boy...
He cannot let others know how he feels in any other way.
The Express Linear Train, bound for Atsugi is arriving on Track 2.
For your safety, please step back to the area inside the yellow lines.
The train arriving on Track 2 is for special government use only
and departs at 4:20 for Atsugi.
No civilians are allowed inside the fence.
Please be aware that the boarding of this train
by unauthorized persons is strictly prohibited.
Hang in there.
Hey, look!
Hey, it is that babe!
The local train bound for Gora is now arriving on Track 4.
For your own safety, please stay inside the yellow lines.
If you are accompanying small children,
please ensure that they are properly supervised.
The train arriving on Track 4 is the local shuttle to Gora departing at 4:32.
If this is your train, please step inside and wait until departure.
The train is now approaching.
Please stay behind the yellow line.
TO BE CONTINUED...
Ayanami Rei lives with minimal contact with others.
Shinji is at a loss to see this girl who is closer to his father than he.
Before the wound in his heart heals up...
